content.body: FYI, for anyone intending to read the Async Resource Management proposal spec text, GitHub is having issues with Pages deployments currently so the spec text at https://tc39.es/proposal-async-explicit-resource-management is not up to date. Until the issue is resolved, the spec text at https://tc39.es/proposal-async-explicit-resource-management/pr/6 is the most up to date version.
